Add Drawbridges.description: Have the ability to use draw bridges would be great for the community, it would both look good and be practical. Right now we have motes around our castles, that we have to jump. Would be nice to have a bridge we can lower and raise. Also would make castles look a little more real, since lots castles have this type of bridge/gate

Add Gyroscope to advanced editing modes.description: there is already a mod that was made called gizmo here is the link to their github and i was wondering if a solution like that would be possible to implement. https://github.com/rolopogo/ValheimMods/tree/main/Gizmo

Add a beautify tool to the Hoe.description: Add a clean up tool to fix horrible looking terraform

Add a ramp tool to the Hoe.description: Add a ramp tool that can specify an angle, i.e. 25 degree ramp and then auto levels and creates the ramp for you.

Add all resources to kiln/smelter/etc. i.description: Add a option to auto input up to the maximum amount of ore from the players inventory and nearby chests into the respective processing building. reference

Additional Server Side Config.description: Add additional server config options, such as console to Server chat, bash commands, Customizing how the server appears on the lists

Adjust Spawn Points.description: Add Random Joining Locations across the Equatorial Line with character specific Trophy Shrines, these will give individual character buffs and allows all with access to shrine area the normal ability to learn boss skills.

Adjustable UI.description: Add the ability to move around the UI elements

Allow all ores in blast furnace.description: Add a configurable setting that allows you to select which ores can be smelted in the blast furnace.

Allow first person to be overridden.description: I would like to set ([FirstPerson] enabled=false) in my config, and not have that overridden when I join a server that forces it to true. First Person is neat, but it breaks the Build Camera mod which I can't live without. The alternative of course is if the Build Camera mod becomes compatible with FirstPerson, or a "Build Camera" feature is implemented into V+

Allow more granular inventory size chang.description: V+ lumps Iron chest, Cart and Longship inventories under a single config. It also doesn't allow changes to the Karve or Personal chest inventory. Would like it if I could set all of these independently. Additionally options should gracefully handle destruction of object or death of character without losing inventory.

Alter NPC Behaviour.description:
Add the ability to make their turning speeds faster (so that they don't spend 90% of the time trying to slowly path around objects in their path or other NPC)
Making some of their attack speeds faster - some enemies just attack too slow, like trolls.
Maybe give them more types of attacks as options if they cannot reach you.
I want enemies to be more aggressive so that I can increase stamina regen rates drastically but still have challenging and faster paced combat action in Valheim!

Alternative textures for buildings.description: I would like to be able to build/edit my own Firling styled bases, substituting my thatch roof for a Lox-skin roof (even if it uses different building materials to achieve - actually I'd prefer that too). I would also like to be able to use the Portal graphic as an actual portal that I can assign, just using the summoned graphic instead of the regular one. Also I've noticed that some existing structures that LOOK like what we can build has objects that are not currently in my build list. Such as the larger, flat square of stone I just saw at the bottom of a staircase.

Auto Eat last eaten foods.description: A more simplistic mod with less cfg options/clutter that auto eats last eaten food and optionally auto uses potions when poisoned,freezing, or below an HP threshold

Auto deposit for Windmill.description: You have already added the features to auto deposit from furances / beehives to nearby chests, make it exist for windmill too please

Auto weapon switch after swimming.description: Add the ability to auto equip the weapons you were holding before you entered water.

Bow Ammo.description: Show the arrow count in some way when the bow is equipped. reference

Burn Unwanted Items.description: Add a the ability to burn/destroy unwanted items in the kiln

Change Animal State Times.description: Add the ability to control or remove how long certain moods last, i.e. remove the boards frightened state.

CharacterID Whitelist.description: This will make it so that players can only log into a server with characterIDs that are whitelisted.

Chat System Extension.description: It would be nice to have the option for multiple chat rooms, such as Global Chat, Region-Based Chats, Area Chats, etc. Even Trade or LFG Chats! reference

Chinese translation for config.description: Add a chinese translation for the V+ configuration file

Control what Animals Eat.description: Add the ability to control what food animals eat, e.g. make it so boars can eat every type of food.

Craftable Chains.description: Add the ability to craft chains in the forge

Custom Map Markers.description: A system to add custom map markers to the player map with custom icons and more, including if you want to share the Map Marker with others.

Dedicated Shield Slot.description: Add a Dedicated shield slot or setting to have shield automatically reequip when you switch from a 2-hand back to a 1-hand.

Disable AI Spawns within Area extended s.description: Disable AI Spawns within the Area extended spawn Area from the PVP mode.

Disable rain/weather.description: Add the option on dedicated server to disable rain or maybe reduce how often it can occur. For me, I'd like to just disable rain and maybe even fog altogether. Others might rather have something like rain not occurring more often than every 7 days or something.

Display a message to all connected Playe.description: A console command for the admin to send a message to all connected users on the server. reference

Display carts and boats on the map.description: A system to show boats and carts you own on the map. reference

Dynamite for Mining.description: Add dynamite sticks for quickly mining like in MineCraft.

Endless Waves Base Defense.description: Create an alter of stone. Sacrifice some items at the alter and it initiates an endless waves attack. Try to defend the alter for as many waves as possible. When alter is destroyed you lose. Rewards given based on how many waves you defeated.

Enforce other mods on/off.description: Add the ability to specify other allowed mods on the server and disable them on client side if they are enabled.

Enforced Inventory Check.description: Add a server side check to enforce the same inventory as when the player last left the server.

Expanded Trader.description: Add a marketplace function for larger servers

Extend Spawn Area Range.description: Extend the spawn area by a custom configuration value.

Fall Damage.description: Add the ability to alter or remove fall damage completely.

In-game Clock.description: A ingame display of the in-game. reference

Increase difficulty based on day in game.description: Add the ability to add a difficulty multiplier per day.

Increase running speed on player built g.description: 5% faster running on wooden floor and 10% faster running on stone floor

Inscriptions on Items.description: The ability to tag items with player-customized messages.

Inventory Organization Buttons.description: Add functional buttons like sorting to storage GUIs such as chests

Last Save Timer.description: Add a last save and time until next save UI element.

Lock Items Together.description: Add the ability to craft items which are permanently fastened to other items, i.e. locking a bed to a boat.

Make the Trailer ship craftable and usab.description: Currently the Trailer ship can only be spawned through console commands and you cannot sail it. For all other intents and purposes its works as a normal boat(storage included)

Map Marker Sync System.description: A system to synchronize all map markers

Merchant Discovery.description: Add a Merchant discovery tip on the map since it is currently based on luck.

Modifiers for Berries and Bushes.description: Add a configuration settings to modify the amount of berries harvested from bushes. reference

Modify Block and Parry Levels of Weapons.description: Add the ability to modify block and parry levels. Not being able to modify block values for weapons - especially 2h weapons- makes block worthless when setting up dmg scaling for +100%.

Modify Fishing.description: Add the ability to modify the amount of fish caught by size. I.e. set small to 4, medium to 3 etc.

Modify Terrain Limitations.description: Modify the terrain modification limitations of the game. reference

Open doors when hammer equipped.description: Add the ability to open a door (etc) when you have the hammer equipped.

Option to make all items float.description: Offer a option to make all items float in water. reference

Option to remove map clouds.description: Add the option to disable the clouds being shown on the large and mini map.

Overhaul Planting System.description: Add the ability to grow anything found in the game but only in the biomes it belongs in, i.e. no thistle in the meadows.

PVP Mode.description: We are working on a exclusive PVP Mode that will be a addition to the Valheim Plus core mod as a separate mod.

Permission System for Console Commands.description: A system to only allow certain players with certain permissions on a server to use specified console commands. reference

Player Craftable Mob Spawners.description: Craft mob Spawners to protect your base from other players and besieging mobs. It uses the ward system to approve players who you don’t want the mobs to attack

Protected Pets.description: Make pets immortal or protected so only player can kill them or essential so they lay down for a bit after taking a deadly hit(edited).

Push/Pull Doors.description: Add the ability to specify whether a door can open both ways, or only push or pull.

REST API.description: Offer a rest api endpoint to deliver information to a website or similar.

Raid Settings.description: Offer extended settings regarding world raids. reference

Reduce Teleportation Times.description: Reduce the amount of time it takes to travel through a portal

Remove Fog.description: Add the ability to remove fog from the game.

Remove Ground Height Limits.description: Remove/change the limits to how high/low you can dig or build

Remove Smoke Vent Requirement.description: Add the ability to disable smoke damage and visibility - in other words, ability to build a fire indoors without having to vent

Repairs require materials.description: Make item repairs cost a % of the items used to create it. reference

Reset mob wave when bosses are killed.description: Every time the server completes a boss, the enemies in the Meadows get more difficult. As of now, our server has beaten the 5th boss and Fulings spawn in the Meadows at night. This makes it very difficult for a new and growing server, such as ours, to introduce new players to our server without them bringing in end-game gear.

Respawn System for Caves and Dungeons.description: Respawn/Reset dungeons/caves and burials after a defined period of passed time. reference

Retrievable arrows & aim/Arrow physics i.description: A chance to get your arrows back without the special effects i.e Frost arrow reverts to Obsidian arrow and a new recipe to craft special arrows using already made base arrows. i.e obsidian arrows x20 + Freeze glad = Frost Arrow x20. Arrows go where cross-hair is + better velocity and trajectory.

Right-click to take/place a single item.description: Right clicking to take a single item from a stack (or place from a held stack into an empty slot) at a time is something I find myself wanting to do very often, and in line with functionality from Valheim predecessors such as Terraria

Scrollable Inventory on Controller.description: Add the ability to scroll using controller in the inventory, crafting stations etc.

Search bars.description: Inventory and Crafting table search bars. reference

Server Specific Characters & Inventory.description: A networking system for server specific characters with all their skills and inventories synchronised.

Set LODBios for all players on server.description: Add ability to adjust the servers LOD Bios and force that value to all players

Show hit points on health bar.description: Add the option to show current and max health of any monsters, animals or players.

Show portal names.description: Display a big message with the portals name on the player hud. reference

Sleep on any bed.description: Add the ability to sleep on any bed without setting spawn points. Also introduce sleeping bags if possible.

System to modify merchant items and cost.description: A system to modify the offered items from the merchant and their specific costs. reference

Toggle Autofuel on and off for kiln and.description:
Option to be able to toggle autoFuel on/off for Kiln as anyone like me who has wood in chests for building that are within range will get depleted by the Kiln.
Additionally an option to be able to turn fires on/off - it's awesome having fire sources permanently lit, however being able to toggle individual  items on and off would be great

Toggle Personal/Shared Map.description: Add the ability to toggle personal map progress off/on when using the map sharing feature

Tree Respawn.description: Causes a new sapling to grow when a tree stump is removed.

Use portals to connect to other servers.description: Add the ability to change server through a portal. The server IP and port should be entered as the portals name.

Webhook Events.description: Add the ability to send a webhook event to Discord (for example) upon an event happening, i.e. player joining, leaving, being banned, a mob event starting etc
